links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 17000); x=contfrac(sqrt(45)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b010135.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 06 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A010499 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 06 2009
